name: Wagoneer
0:
”Alexa, ask Wagoneer to check the tire pressure of my car”
”Alexa, ask Wagoneer how much gas is in my car.”
”Alexa, ask Wagoneer to find the nearest gas station.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wagoneer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
WAGONEER SKILL FOR AMAZON ALEXA

Command your Wagoneer Brand vehicle from the comfort of your home using only your voice. Simply ask Alexa on an Alexa-enabled device to start/stop the engine (1), lock/unlock the doors (1), check fuel status, and more.

With available navigation, you can ask Alexa to find restaurants and other destinations and then send the addresses directly to your vehicle for added convenience.
 
SUPPORTED VEHICLES

• 2022 and newer Wagoneer
• 2022 and newer Grand Wagoneer

EQUIPMENT REQUIREMENTS

• Must have account set up with Wagoneer Connect (2) and be in a trial or paid subscription

SAMPLE COMMANDS
• “Alexa, Ask Wagoneer to start my car with Voice Code XXXX.”
• “Alexa, Ask Wagoneer how much gas is in my car.”
To get a complete list of commands, say, “Alexa, Ask Wagoneer for help with my car.”

SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

To link your Uconnect system to Amazon Alexa:

1. Download the Amazon Alexa App on your iPhone or Android
2. Launch the app, then tap MENU and go to SKILLS
3. Search for Wagoneer, then select by tapping ENABLE
4. Select LINK ACCOUNT
5. Log in using your Vehicle Owner Account ID and password
6. Create your Voice Code on the Setting screen then select AUTHORIZE

(1) Vehicle must be registered with Wagoneer Connect be in an active and usable cellular range, have an active subscription, and properly equipped with remote features. You are responsible for using remote features in accordance with any laws, rules or ordinances in effect in your vehicle’s location. See Terms of Service for service limitations.
(2) All vehicles properly equipped to receive connected services come with a 3-month trial of the full suite of Wagoneer Connect services effective from the date of purchase or lease of a new vehicle. Enrollment in the trial is required to receive service. Upon expiration of the trial period, purchase of a subscription is required to continue or renew services. Wagoneer Connect is available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the United States and Puerto Rico. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available. See the applicable Terms of Service for complete terms and conditions, including service limitations.
